content.detailedDescription: Driving to work about 5:30am on the i-15 south, i noticed on my right side above the hill an orange light with an orange cone slightly angled down. it looked like the orange cone flag you see at an airport only brightly lighted. my thought was ,when did they put a flag on the mountain i never noticed that before.  it was only about a half inch above the hilltop so about the right height to be a flag. so i was watching it ,driving along ,and after about 10 seconds it disappeared. now i got excited! so now i'm watching the sky as i'm driving. i'm away from the area with the hill now,  and boom.  now the orange light appeared in a different part of the sky and seemed as if it had smaller lights underneath it or maybe kinda morphed the shape a little bit. illuminated the sky kind of like when an airplane flies to the cloud. about the same amount of time it disappeared. i'm sooo excited i saw a ufo!!!! it wasn't done yet. once more it appears ,now at the south end of rancho cucamonga, near ontario international airport. bright orange light slowly descending. this was at 5:40am. i finished my commute watching the sky the best i could. then it occurred to me, no flights were landing or leaving from ontario. this is very strange. the morning hours are busy for flights from that airport. i arrived at my office at around 6:00am and started telling the guys. most gave it a laugh until i showed them no planes were coming or going. we saw passengers planes in the sky only far away near other airports. this all happened with a clear sky no clouds,other lights or obstructions.
content.summary: Orange light,orange cone. disrupt airport?

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were chasing lightning, and noticed a strange orange light to the east.  we were approx 10 miles ne of langenburg.  after watching for approx 3 mins, the orange orb seemed to split and kick out small white orbs, thé would not move but would disappear and reappear.
after about 20 mins the white orbs went back into the orange orb and it went up into the thunder clouds...  i have got video and photos of other sightings from this area...  a lot of people have witnessed similar things in this 10 mile diameter...
the photos and video are not from this incident but from the same area...
content.summary: Have had many sightings in a 10 mile area photoes and video

content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking for the cat, and military helicopter passed, so i looked up and noticed bright star like but bigger light moving se, slowing down, than moving faster, kind of side to side a little too, it started loosing brightness and disappeared. helicopter came back, so i kept watching. another light went south , but at constant speed and it was less bright, appeared to be higher. i went inside and got binoculars. in about a minute another bright one moving same direction as first one, i looked in binoculars and before it disappeared it became orangish smaller light with red-ish outline.This one wasn't wobbling that much. after another 5 minutes or so small star like light moved at constant speed north. helicopter was gone. i looked for another 10 -15 minutes but no more action.
content.summary: 2 bright star like, but bigger than any star, moved little off straight line, wobbled and not at constant speed, 1 small moved south, than aother one north

content.detailedDescription:
I am a pretty rational woman,i observed lights in the sky that are definitely not stars ,i thought ok i will take a look tomorrow night to see if they were still there ,and yes they were ,just round disc shaped objects with a window that very slowly turns as if looking around,i am 100% sure that what i am seeing is real,each night they are sometimes in different places and sometimes there are more and sometimes not so many,they are just above the clouds.
one night i decided to wave and see what would happen, to see if they could see me ,as the craft was moving very slowly left to right but stationary ,it must of seen me as it turned and faced me for a good minute and then carried on doing what it was doing .
now this is something else i have to tell you ,because when i try to educate people on what i see,its like they are not willing to acknowledge what im saying,ok one night for some reason i decided to take a pic of my back garden ,its not a thing i would normally do at night but when i enlarged the pic on my windows phone i captured something ,it looks like something was trying to not be seen as it tried to blend in with my garden fence ,there is a red like line that trailed around and behind it ,it looks kind of looks amphibian ,i swear this is no hoax i have the evidence on my phone,i also tried to take pics of the ufo's but for some reason my phone cant see them, evan though i can clearly see them,i have contacted you because i have to tell someone that will hopefully take me seriously about what i see and the pic i have.I hope i have put the right pic in as i am not very computor literate.
content.summary: They are above my home every night ,for the last 6 months

content.detailedDescription: On sept 28, 2017, starting around 8:20pm i saw a large bright orange stationary light from the window near my desk/computer in my home.  the lights were so bright and stationary (and therefore very different from what i usually see from this window, i.E. normal airplane traffic and occasional helicopters) that i got in my car and drove to the top of a hill near my house.  the lights then separated into several pulsating orange/red lights.  the lights stayed in fixed position (i.E. did not move/float/dissipate for several minutes). i took few photos with my phone and then took a video.  at first i thought they could be chinese lanterns, or some science experiment from some university students (i live very near san diego state university), but due to the fact that the same lights were seen in tijuana, mexico on the same night, it sort of rules out that logical explanation. i found two videos of these lights on youtube for the same night (september 28, 2017), both looking up from the ground.  one video is from san diego, and one is from a beach in tijuana, mexico.  my video timed itself as 8:31pm pacific time. i am unable to attach the video because it is too large, but i will attach 2 photos.  i will hopefully attend next local mufon meeting in san diego to show my video.
content.summary: 4-5 pulsating orange/red lights in fixed position over san diego on sept 28 2017 for 20 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
Așteptam autobuzul. ridicând privirea spre cer,am văzut inițial un punct strălucitor ce mi-a făcut impresia că e un asteroid.Dar observ că își schimbă direcția rotindu-se. văd și celălalt punct strălucitor. observ că se îndreaptă înspre spatele meu. spre est.Iau telefonul și reușesc să prind unul dintre cele două puncte în fotografie.
mi-a părut rău că nu am reușit să fac poze de la început. 
nu este prima dată când observ astfel de fenomen. 
prima dată am văzut în 14 aprilie 1998,apoi în octombrie 2013.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Am văzut ca două puncte strălucitoare.

content.detailedDescription: Approx. 2400 a ufo was seen hovering over loc, three lights on each corner of a triangle shaped craft, two green one orange. after approx. 10mins it began to shine a light across farm fields in area. did this for approx. two minutes, then moved away.
content.summary: Ufo hovered then ran a beam over nearby fields

content.detailedDescription: On saturday night, sept 16, 2017, i had stepped out onto my deck to look at the clear night, and was facing north west through the trees. i saw a bright orange star that was different, and i watched it to see if it was an airplane or possibly a satellite. as i watched it i noticed a smaller ball of light drop out of the "orb" or what ever it was. it was like a ball of fire dropped straight out of the "mother craft ?" and went to the ground. i half expected an explosion, but heard and saw nothing. there was no trail, just a clear drop strait out of the center or the objec. then it dropped another ball of fire, which also seemed to drop straight down for a while. it seems it may have veered to the left before dropping out of sight. several seconds elapsed when it began to drop fire balls on a more rapid succession. the larger orb/star/satellite/ began to move slowly towards the south into a more westerly direction and began to be obscured by trees. i actually checked the news for reports of explosions or other witnesses, but haven't found any yet. the idea that it was an airplane fighting fires is debunked as there are no fires burning to the west, and it wasn't an airplane, as it stayed stationary for quite a while. it wasn't fireworks, though it kind of reminded me of some upside down fireworks. it was way too high to have been fireworks, and again, no sound was heard. i researched some other photos and it looks exactly like what some describe as an orange org, however, i haven't seen anyone else report it dropping smaller balls of fire from it's center. these smaller balls all went straight down towards the ground, but it seems some veered off as they got closer to the ground. i didn't have a full horizon as there is a small hill in the direction i saw the object.
content.summary: Bright star orange /fireball that was dropping several smaller fireball objects from it's center.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to work, east, ~8:15 am  toward waverly, ne when i noticed a very bright light in the distance. appeared starlike. sun was fairly close to horizon at this point so i knew the light was very bright. i watched it disappear and reappear before vanishing. i came into waverly around 8:30 am when the light reappered in the distance, this time moving slowly around in the sky. it dissapeared again as i reached my job site. 

around noon-12:30 as i was eating lunch and returning to work i noticed a dark v outline in the clouds. this formation stayed constant as i traveled 10 minutes back to work. nothing noticeable happened after. i have no idea how long the shadow persisted but it was gone at least after 2 hours when i left.
content.summary: Strange star-light then shadows

content.detailedDescription: I saw a perfect line of lights positioned vertically in the sky. the lights were all vertical and moving as one across the sky. about 15-20 lights. moving slowly enough to follow with a naked eye.
content.summary: There was a straight line of lights. about 15-20 lights. lined up perfectly vertical and heading south.

content.detailedDescription:
I had let my mature 10 yr. d daughter stay up for the first time to watch fireworks. we had a bad experience the days before when friends of ours house burnt to the ground. my daughter was looking out the large picture window scanning the sky for fireworks. suddenly she said mom there's a plane on fire in the sky. i ran to the window and saw what looked like a light in the sky with bright spark like trails dropping from it
. it stayed high as it passed over the house. we ran outside to see if we could still see it. when we were standing on the sidewalk we saw a huge craft directly above us. it made very little sound only a sort of humming. it was so big it blocked out the stars. it was saucer shaped and had red and yellow lights pulsing around the diameter. we watched with only what i can describe as joy. i didn't know how long we had been watching then it slowly rose straight up and disappeared in an instant. when we returned to the house we had been out there for two hours. you can't tell me or my daughter that what we experienced was not a huge saucer.
content.summary: Observed what looked like a plane on fire. watched going out door as it passed. when we got to the front it was clearly a football field size quietly hovering directly above us. we watched tickled to see if. it seemed like a few minutes before it raised u

content.detailedDescription:
I first noticed a bright light in the sky (south direction) just below the moon (8:02pm), and thought nothing of it as there are frequent aircraft in the area. as i continued to watch and heard no noise as it moved across the sky(8:05pm). this light continued on its path towards the east. i didn't observe the common lights that are produced by airplanes and helicopters. it was just a continuous bright light that didn't seem to change. the orb seemed to be descending quite quickly, i did have to adjust my standing position (and that explains some of the movement) but there are times (tree reference)that i didn't move, that the orb appears to change direction in the sky. at the 10 second mark in the video, the object appears to send out a second light, then continues on its path, it seems to move in different directions very quickly. i lost sight of the object as it disappeared behind some trees. 

i was very excited to capture something different in the skies above as i am very interested in what is above us, what is beyond our world.


the video was shot using an iphone 7.
content.summary: Orb decending in sky

content.detailedDescription: Got off work at 2am, and went out to my car. being an avid skywatcher, i was looking around, and noticed a light pulsing regularly in the sky. it remained stationary, and cycled a yellow-orange light on and off, fading in and out, for about a minute before disappearing. not sure if it stopped or was hidden by clouds, but i know it wasn't aircraft lights, even though it was followed 10 minutes later by an airplane. i attempted to video it, but only having a cellphone, the usefulness is dubious. phone will not let me upload on your site, please contact me for file.
content.summary: Yellow-orange light pulsing on and off at 10-second intervals seen in sky

content.detailedDescription: a friend of mine called me at four in the morning. he is on eastern time, six hours ahead of us, and didn't realize it was 4am for me. i walked outside,so i wouldn't wake my wife. as we talked, i looked straight up noticing the moon and how bright it was. then, as i lowered my head i noticed this bright object way off, like a star, but much brighter. i could see two nearby stars to use as reference points. the object was very bright and had a symmetrically shaped bright swirl on both sides of it, a mirror image of each other. the object as well as the aura surrounding it moved south in the sky maintaining its size and shape the whole time. i ran inside and brought my wife outside to see it. as we watched it, it continued to move south, and grew in size getting much bigger than it originally was, yet maintaining its shape perfectly. it finally began to fade in brightness and eventually just disappeared completely, before leaving our line of site. while i watched the object i took two pictures. one at normal focus, and then i zoomed in and took another shot.
content.summary: Object hovered in place,  then moved south just above horizon, increased in size, then disappeared.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my windo when i saw two bright lights that did not look like any plane lights in the air that i have ever seen. these lights were beaming and straight in direction. the aparatus they were attached to was hovering and then the loghts went out one by one, and the ship dissappeared into thin air. i first noticed the object when i looked out my window. i told my mom "mom i think this is a ufo!" as soon as i looked back out the window, the beams shut off and the object disappeared. i was amazed.
content.summary: Two bright lights on a circular shaped ufo, lights went out then ufo disappeared completely in thin air

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in the front yard having a cigarette with my wife. 

my wife noticed a closer, brighter object in the sky than the previous sightings we have seen. 

we obviously thought it was an airplane as usual.
 
then we noticed no flashing lights just a bright light moving from west to east turned south eastward. it moved at the same speed wobbling right to left, got smaller then fading away. then we observed another object that looks like a star as we have seen before. same movements moving from north to south then disappearing. right after we saw the third object but from south going north then fading away. we have been seeing these objects in the sky the past three months. same object, movements but different areas in the sky. 

we felt excited and amazed when we see them. not knowing what it is, we are confused. doesn't move like a satellite. too slow for a shooting star. too high and bright to be an airplane. i felt to let you guys know about it to see if anyone else sees them.
content.summary: We sit outside when it's dark and we see these star like orbs at first looks like a satellite but then it wobbles right to left turns direction then fades away. been noticing them the past two months over calgary alberta canada

content.detailedDescription: Bonjour à voir je comprends pas tout vos questions alors j'étais couché dans mon lit au petite heure du matin et ma chambre est devenu toute éclairer comme par une spots j'avais de la difficulté à voir sa fessais mal au yeux. j'ai accouru à ma fenêtre pour regarde et j'ai juste vue une boule de lumière s'envoler et disparaître au sud est.

I was tired. i layed in bed around eight pm. i had my personal computer in my room on to eveonline.
  i heard voices telling me to wake up get on the floor. i tried to kick my yellow chair and couldn't do it no matter how hard i tried.
   the voices told me to get on the floor and i could not move at all.

i thought i saw and it felt like the chair fell but a moment later i did get up and the chair was there upright. i went out to have a cigarette at 11:11 pm.
content.summary: I woke up at 11:11 and could not move at all.

content.detailedDescription:
So i am never one to post these sorts of things, but we just saw some really odd lights in the sky? lol. a friend says there was a light show tonight, but when i mapped the location of the show it is 11km away and behind us from where we saw them. i am sure ultimately its nothing of note but it was weird. i made the videos silent just because i was spazzing out in them and it was embarassing lol.

we actually watched it "move" for a while. we were headed home when we first saw it, and these are with my window down so not anything reflected into the glass. after that moment in the second video when they zoom off, we didn't see it for a bit. just before getting home, i noticed them again. we brought our stuff inside, and then went to go have a smoke and saw it again but had movef further west and then it was again further west to us before we went inside. i would love an easy explanation for what this was cuz i cant get it outta my head lol.

i haven't seen anyone mention anything, but i was with my roomate and my mom & dad, so i wasn't alone for my "crazy moment" at least lol. i aaaaalways watch the sky when i'm out and then apparently all they heard from me was "what the f*** is that?" as i rolled my window down lol. we were at a red light and then it was blocked briefly by the suv beside us, otherwise i would have had a pretty awesome shot. "it" wasn't in that circular form when i first saw it, it was more linear and i thought maybe i was seeing some crazy lightning. i dont know what i saw.
content.summary: Saw distinct flashing lights in sky, that at one point zoomed off screen. have two shirt videos.

content.detailedDescription:
Here is my account of many unidentified objects myself, my girlfriend's father (gff) and i experienced last night in quakertown in the morning hours of 10/8/17. i did need not keep an accurate track time of when it all started. i did go to bed at 7:30am when it started getting light and everything was no longer visual.

imagine standing on the 50 yard line of a football field. you are standing with a camera in the neutral zone above the center. you are to record the play as it happens around you. you can't, because you are standing in the middle of it. i have great video of this event, but the totality of how massive it was cannot be captured, because everything was happening around us. we were in the center of it all. also, try to record a full moon. it looks like a very small light. realize the video i have does not even begin to capture the colors which were much clearer and pure white first hand.

the trees in the campground are very tall. i would guess 100'. gff and i did not figure out the totality of everything going on around is until probably an hour in. 

gff, my girlfriebd and i were sitting around the campfire all facing the same direction. it was a humid night and not windy at all. the fire was a very clean fire with very little smoke. as we sat there it got very windy on the treetops above us but it was not windy at all below. acorns were dropping like flies out of the trees for,i would guess,15-20 minutes. i would guess this was around 1:30am. the acorns were landing all around us. none of us thought anything unusual about it. my girlfriend went to bed. (at this point as far as i could see, there was nobody else up at the campground) after she went to bed, gff noticed small orange lights not a foot off the ground maybe 30 yards in front of us. they would go from a light orange to a dark orange. they were very small. there were also white lights as well. again, tiny tiny lights. then he started to notice orbs flying around with his naked eye. i couldn't see it. i grabbed my phone and in looking through the camera of my phone i could see the orbs. they would move no higher than 10' off the ground, literally to the ground. i got up to walk towards the small lights and the orbs would come towards me. i photographed a blue orb. the video i have of the orbs is not blue. at one point gff saw 8. they were all around me and also at my feet. only when i approached the tiny lights did the orbs move closer to me.

at this point i turned around and looked the complete opposite direction and there at a 40 or 50 degree angle in the sky was a big round object.
it was pulsating a code. flashing white and red colors as the code. there were fast blinks and slow, more methodical blinks. there were other normal street lights or typical lights you see at a campground. this was neither. i knew immediately this was a ufo. 

i look to my right 20 degree angle from a horizontal line through me to my right was a very bright pure star light. it was the purest color i have ever seen. the only way i can describe it is looking into a pure diamond in the day light. it is beautiful white perfection. the same exact light to my left. both of these lights were roughly 10' hovering off the ground, and roughly 30 yards each away from me. the blinking light in the sky and these two lights formed a perfect triangle. as i turned back around i could now see more small lights. don and i were directly in the center of this phenomenon. i captured video of an orb bouncing around with the main ufo in the air. multiple videos of orbs lining up with main pulsating object. i could not capture video of all three at a time. they were too far apart.
the star like ufo to my right was blinking ever so slowly at one point, appearing to signal the one on my left. i have this on video. i never saw the one on my left blink.

the light to my right was just left of a tree. i looked to the right of the tree and i could literally see, as best i can describe it as gravity displacement from the light. the objects to the right, were all waving in this displacement. it was literally only about a 5' displacement. 

the last thing we noticed was the sky above us and to the right was a deep haunted blue color. it was a massive color. as far as you could see it was this color. again, above and only to the right. it did blink, ever so slightly from the deep blue to black. i have never seen the sky this color in my life.

also, during this experience we would look up and see one tree moving vigorously from the "wind" but the tree right next to it was not moving at all. 

i cannot explain what i saw. i have never seen anything like this in my life. it was an unbelievable experience. i was in awe and not scared. i was only scared to walk towards the objects to my right and left, and did not.

note:i have a lot of video. i will not release the rights to your organization. a member of your team is welcome to meet with me to view them.
content.summary: Observed 3 ufo's triangulating with orb activity.

content.detailedDescription: I just saw a fairly large light show ufo in ottawa ontario canada. maybe 100 yards from the ottawa airport. i work at the airport and  i am familiar with aircraft. at first it looked like search lights in the sky, i was driving. i pulled over and witnessed roughly 10 columns of large spread out light all moving towards a center, the light got smaller as they got closer to one another. went on for a couple minutes. couldn't see an object, just strange white lights. i tried to get a video but it was too dark. it was a good one.
content.summary: Lights near airport.

content.detailedDescription: Light to my noth vanished then an explosion at high altitude then light left to the west
content.summary: Light to my west vanished then an explosion at high altitude then light left to the south

content.detailedDescription: I was going my homework in a building and saw three lights across the water and over the trees but didnt think much of it until i noticed that they weren't going away and just hovering and changing places. i watched them and recorded them for a good half hour. the three lights would change places and disapear, but then another light would take its place back in the from of the line of lights. the lights just eventually dissapeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Three hovering lights that i saw move and change places in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Ottawa, ontario, canada at 9:20 pm.  driving towards downtown on bronson avenue near carleton university.  overcast skies, low clouds.  i noticed in the sky directly in front of me a large number of small lights (about 20-30 lights) flashing in the sky just above clouds in sequential pattern format (like choreography - travelling in a light pattern.  at first, i thought it was a light show of some sort, but then realized that the light show was directly over the 6 lanes of road, so the light show idea could not make sense at all.  then, noticed a larger series of lights in the form of a disc quite low behind the clouds, just over the road ahead of me.  the lights flashed in a sequential format - a few white lights at a time, rotating around in a circle format (from this format, i could tell it was a disc shape object, by the way the lights were forming a perfect circle).  then, as i continued driving closer to downtown, i looked out the car window again and saw the lights take off in all different directions and then vanish in the night sky.  

since i was driving, i was not able to take photos.  i quickly turned around and watched the sky to the south direction on the same road, but saw nothing.  

i wonder if anyone else noticed as it was quite a spectacle in the sky for just a few (5) minutes, but clearly something other than an airplane (round, no sound, hovering low in the sky just behind the clouds, sequential flashing lights).  and, when the lights took off in all directions, again no sound, just ultra fast dispersement and then nothing.  no one can convince me that this light display was fireworks, a low-flying plane, a weather balloon, etc.  this was clearly something beyond comprehension.  it would be interesting to see other reports from ottawa tonight - all seeing the same thing as we saw.

it was quite thrilling to see something of this size.  it was huge.  and the smaller lights with it - about 20 or 30 all travelling together.  wow.

and, no - i was not drinking or taking any drugs.  i had a clear head, good vision, and sound mind.  my husband was with me in the car and he saw the exact same things that i saw.  two witnesses.
content.summary: Series of small orbs flashed sequentially over sky, then large disc shape flashed lights sequentially over road (low cloud cover).  then, all lights went in all directions and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Outside for cigarette at 19:30 hrs. and saw a starlike oject going east and faded. one going north was high and faded abouve tree line. east one  was prop plane height. one gong east was jet plane height
content.summary: One starlike object moving east, other starlke oject moving north

content.detailedDescription:
I saw it at a distance and as i stared at it, it appeared to come closer.  it was mostly just a large light.  it only came to my attention because i was talking on my ham radio and i started getting some type of loud static, i was very upset because i had found a female human on the radio to talk to, so i walked outside to smoke a quick joint.  i could not tell much about the object because the lights were so bright i could not make out much of a shape until later when it left.  i also noticed that my cat "snots" would not look away from the object.  after the object left i started walking with a limp and the cat seems to have a serious eye infection.  i only saw it for a couple seconds but when i sat down on the couch i realized i must have fallen asleep because the morning news was on and the sun was coming up.  i am very confused about the timeline of the events.    

i would like someone to contact me to discuss this further.
content.summary: I saw it at a distance and as i stared at it, it appeared to come closer.
